channel.title: amazon on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in amazon on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-05
item.description: Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Oculus are down. Here’s what we know (2 minute read) Facebook and all of its services went down today.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-29
item.description: Here’s everything Amazon just announced: A home robot named Astro, a fitness band and more (6 minute read) Amazon just announced a bunch of new gadgets ahead of the busy holiday shopping season.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-22
item.description: Apple Developing a Whole New Kind of MacBook Air (2 minute read) Apple is working on a new high-end MacBook Air.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-18
item.description: Amazon is expanding Amazon Care telehealth service nationally for its employees and other companies (3 minute read) Amazon Care is rolling out for Amazon employees in all 50 states starting this summer.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-03
item.description: Amazon will have a new CEO as Jeff Bezos transitions to executive chair later this year (2 minute read) Jeff Bezos will step down as CEO and become the executive chair of the Amazon board in Q3 2021.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-11
item.description: Apple, Hyundai set to agree electric car tie-up (2 minute read) Hyundai Motor and Apple Inc are planning to sign a partnership deal on autonomous electric cars by March.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-18
item.description: Amazon jumps into the pharmacy business with online prescription fulfillment, free delivery for Prime members (6 minute read) Amazon Pharmacy has launched in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-30
item.description: Amazon jumps into virtual tourism, offering live one-on-one experiences around the world (5 minute read) Amazon Explore is Amazon’s new tech platform and marketplace that offers access to live virtual experiences with people from around the world.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-18
item.description: Amazon Fresh grocery store in Los Angeles opens to the public (1 minute read) Amazon Fresh at Woodland Hills, Los Angeles is now open to the public from 7 AM to 10 PM PT daily.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-02
item.description: Dating app Bumble preparing for an IPO above $6 billion (1 minute read) Bumble is preparing for an Initial Public Offering early next year, possibly seeking a valuation of between $6 billion to $8 billion.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-28
item.description: TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer to leave the company (4 minute read) TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer has resigned from the company just months after his appointment.
